headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 13 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 13 airports right now. Across base airports: 2 critical, 19 high, 18 medium. Base airports needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 16 others. Other base airports are mostly medium severity and should be monitored (18 flagged). At base airports, the main issues are snow and runway contamination risk at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and 3 others, mist at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and Craiova (CRA/LRCV) and 15 others, and low cloud base at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and Craiova (CRA/LRCV) and 15 others. Across the network, the worst‑affected airports include Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 7 others. Primary drivers are low cloud base, mist and cold‑temperature performance penalties. Expected impact: reduced runway capacity and higher delay/diversion risk at the worst‑affected airports, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 6 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 13 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; strong gusts risk; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: freezing fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 15 others. Worst affected now: Al Massira (AGA/GMAD) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 200 m, RVR down to 350 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), approach minima limits, very low visibility) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) — CRIT: fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; cloud base around 300 ft (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, snow/blowing snow) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) and 7 others. Changed since last run: Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Solidarity Szczecin–Goleniów (SZZ/EPSC), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) and 2 others.
